page.title: 10Chipperkyle
page.content: Chipperkyle is a large house, about 2 00 years old. It has about 40 rooms and a large garden and courtyard. All the rooms are still as they used to be. Most of the rooms have paintings or drawings in them. Everything that used to be in the rooms is still there. There are still even old dishes. The lady of the house is away just now and the house is being decorated and central heating and eletricity being put in. The house keeper cleans the house 3 days every week. The beds that are in the house are from the Army. Her great grandfather brought them back.
